text: Ratabari Assembly constituency is one of the 126 constituencies of the Legislative Assembly of Assam state in northeastern India. This constituency is reserved for the Scheduled caste candidates. Ratabari (constituency number 1) is one of the 5 Assam Legislative Assembly constituencies located in Karimganj district. Ratabari is part of Karimganj Lok Sabha constituency along with 7 other Assembly segments, namely, Patharkandi, Karimganj North, Karimganj South and Badarpur in this district and Hailakandi, Katlichhera and Algapur in Hailakandi district. ==Members of Legislative Assembly== *1962: Baidyanath Mookerjee, Indian National Congress *1967: B. Upadhya, Indian National Congress *1972: Suranjan Nandy, Indian National Congress *1978: Lilamoy Das, Janata Party *1983: Subal Chandra Das, Indian National Congress *1985: Kumari Rabidas, Indian National Congress *1991: Ramapayare Rabidas, Bharatiya Janata Party *1996: Sambhu Sing Mallah, Bharatiya Janata Party *2001: Rathish Ranjan Choudhury, Independent *2003: (by-election) Kripanath Mallah, Indian National Congress *2006: Sambhu Sing Mallah, Bharatiya Janata Party *2011: Kripanath Mallah, Indian National Congress *2016: Kripanath Mallah, Bharatiya Janata Party *2019: Bijoy Malakar, Bharatiya Janata Party ==Election results== ===2019 result=== Bye Election to assembly constituency oct-2019 ===2016 result=== ===2011 result=== ==See also== * List of constituencies of Assam Legislative Assembly ==References== Category:Karimganj district Category:Assembly constituencies of Assam
title: Ratabari (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
